info.description: This is the backend API for DSView application In Services GO
info.title: DSView API Go Service

get.description: Get announcements for a specific course with optional filtering. Non-teachers can only see announcements from courses they are enrolled in.

post.description: Create a new announcement for a course (teachers only)

get.description: Get recent announcements from all enrolled courses
Get statistics for announcements in a course. Non-teachers can only see stats from courses they are enrolled in.
Get a specific announcement by ID. Non-teachers can only see announcements from courses they are enrolled in.
Generate Google OAuth2 login URL and return to client
Handle callback from Google OAuth2, validate state, exchange code for token, and authenticate user

parameters.description: OAuth2 state parameter for CSRF protection
parameters.name: state

302.description: Redirect to frontend with token or error page

400.description: Bad request - missing or invalid parameters

post.description: Remove refresh token from database and clear OAuth codes (client should discard JWT token)
Generate a new JWT access token using stored Google refresh token

401.description: Unauthorized - no valid session or refresh token expired

get.description: Get course materials for a specific course with optional filtering

put.description: Update an existing course material (creator only)

get.description: Get courses with pagination and filtering. Requires both API key and JWT authentication.

401.description: Unauthorized - Both API key and JWT token required

post.description: Create a new course (Teacher and Admin only). Requires both API key and JWT authentication.

401.description: Unauthorized - Both API key and JWT token required

put.description: Update a user's enrollment role in a course (Teachers only)

get.description: Get detailed course information. Requires both API key and JWT authentication.

401.description: Unauthorized - Both API key and JWT token required

put.description: Update course information (Teacher/Admin only, teachers can only update their own). Requires both API key and JWT authentication.

401.description: Unauthorized - Both API key and JWT token required

delete.description: Delete a course (Teacher/Admin only, teachers can only delete their own). Requires both API key and JWT authentication.

401.description: Unauthorized - Both API key and JWT token required

post.description: Enroll in a course using enrollment key

get.description: Get list of users enrolled in a course
Get exercises in a specific course with role-based filtering

post.description: Upload an image for a course (Teacher/Admin only)

delete.description: Delete the image of a course (Teacher/Admin only)

creator.description: Creator info - populated manually, not a GORM relation

enrollments.description: Relations - Fix the foreign key references

is_public.description: Whether this test case is visible to students
